模块 com.example.BubbleBobble
程序包 com.example.BubbleBobble

类 GamePanel

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Scene
com.example.BubbleBobble.GamePanel
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.event.EventTarget
public class GamePanel extends javafx.scene.Scene
Game panel is where entire game is constantly updated. After every few milliseconds, GamePanel calls the methods that update its InteractableWorld, then repaints the window to display the new drawn graphics.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • GamePanel

      public GamePanel​(javafx.scene.Group root, int width, int height, String color, String background_theme, String difficulty)
      Constructor of game panel, involving several attributes that need for this game panel.
      参数:
      root - the group involves all the components wrapped, including background, static_world, dynamic_world
      width - the width of the scene
      height - the height of the scene
      color - the color of the hero
      background_theme - the theme of the background
      difficulty - the difficulty for the game.

  • 方法详细资料

      Method to choose the background image
      参数:
      type - the type of the background
      返回:
      the image needed for the background.
